Always make a list:

If you would; like then try to make list of the items according to the room. Also don’t forget to prepare “essential box” for the move.

Donate or sell:
Relocation give us the great opportunity to clean our home and get rid of the things which we don’t require and need anymore and off course it is cost friendly, time and effort saving. Why to load the things and waste our energy on items which we don’t require anymore. So separate the things which you don’t require anymore if the items are gently used then you can go for donating them on thrift shop, shelter and support agencies etc or selling them locally or online. If the items are damaged and cannot be use buy anyone then just throw them.

If you have pets and kids:
If you have pets and kids then, for the moving day make the arrangement in advance, like you can ask your friends for help or hire baby sitter for them. Seeing unknown faces will make your pet a really anxious which can lead to disastrous on your moving day, so that apply on your kids seeing the process they will be really confuse and can disturb you in between which can delay the process.

If you are not hiring any professionals then ask for help from your friend or relatives or hire some labor, but don’t go for the process alone. Don’t forget to reward yourself:
